text: Map showing results by Tayside Regional Electoral District. The third election to Tayside Regional Council was held on 6 May 1982 as part of the wider 1982 Scottish regional elections. The election saw the Conservatives strengthening their control of the region's 47-seat council. ==Aggregate results== ==References== Category:1982 Scottish local elections 1982 Category:May 1982 events
title: 1982 Tayside Regional Council election
